text: Paul Joseph Weitz (July 25, 1932 - October 23, 2017) was an American naval officer and aviator, aeronautical engineer, test pilot, and former NASA astronaut. Weitz flew into space twice. He was a member of the three-man crew who flew on Skylab 2, the first manned Skylab mission. He was also Commander of the STS-6 mission, the first of the Space Shuttle Challenger flights. Weitz died on October 23, 2017 in Flagstaff, Arizona from myelodysplastic syndrome at the age of 85. ==References== ==Other websites== *Astronautix biography of Paul J. title: Paul J. Weitz
